pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bagging Bandwidth Selection in Kernel Density and Regression Estimation // Bagging bandwidth selection methods for the Parzen-Rosenblatt and Nadaraya-Watson estimators. These bandwidth selectors can achieve greater statistical precision than their non-bagged counterparts while being computationally fast. See Barreiro-Ures et al. (2020) doi:10.1093/biomet/asaa092 and Barreiro-Ures et al. (2021) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2105.04134.
